articles.title: Fireball Over the Pacific: ESA Satellite Returns to Earth [Video] - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Mission complete. ESA’s second European Remote Sensing (ERS-2) satellite has reentered Earth’s atmosphere over the North Pacific Ocean. The satellite returned on February 21, 2024, at 18:17 CET (17:17 UTC) between Alaska and Hawaii. ERS-2 was launched almost …
articles.content: ESA’s ERS-2 satellite, launched in 1995, has concluded its mission by reentering Earth’s atmosphere over the North Pacific Ocean. (Artist’s concept of a satellite burning up in the atmosphere.) Credi… [+3792 chars]
